sect1.title: The Spring transaction abstraction
sect1.para:
Spring provides a consistent abstraction for transaction management. This abstraction delivers the following benefits:
Provides a consistent programming model across different transaction APIs such as JTA, JDBC, Hibernate, iBATIS Database Layer and JDO
Provides a simpler, easier to use API for programmatic transaction management than most of these transaction APIs
Supports Spring declarative transaction management
Spring provides this consistent model through the PTM

sect1.title: Declarative transaction management
sect1.para: Spring also offers declarative transaction management. This is based on Spring AOP.
Spring declarative transaction management is most similar to EJB CMT.
